snippet.title: FREE DLC | Gas Station Simulator: Drive-In Cinema | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
In this FREE Gas Station Simulator: Drive-In Cinema DLC, run your own outdoor movie theater! Pick from a selection of films or upload your own to show on the big screen. Check tickets and catch fake ones to keep things fair. Earn extra cash by throwing popcorn—but watch out, Dennis might steal it! Keep your cinema clean to bring in more customers and grow your business in this fun new FREE expansion!
________________________________________
👉 Play FREE DLC Gas Station Simulator: Drive-In Cinema:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3014630/Gas_Station_Simulator__DriveIn_Cinema_DLC/
________________________________________
⚠️ Key Features:
🎬 Movie Selection: Upload your own films or choose from a set of predetermined options.
🎟️ Ticket Validation: Check customers' tickets—but watch out for fakes!
🍿 Popcorn Toss: Throw popcorn to earn extra cash, but beware—Dennis might snatch it!
🧹 Keep It Clean: A tidy Drive-In attracts more customers, so stay on top of maintenance.
________________________________________
